alert.note: Alert for South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 1:27PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Walton County through 130 PM CST... At 1227 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Crestview to near Mary Esther. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Portland, Villa Tasso, Blue Mountain Beach, Seaside, Rock Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Gulf Pines, Knox Hill, Bunker, Grayton Beach, Argyle, Sandestin, Four Mile Village, Red Bay and Inlet Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
